thread.title: Target.com: February Beauty Box ONLY $10 Shipped ($38 Value)
thread.title_full: Target.com: February Beauty Box ONLY $10 Shipped ($38 Value)

author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: Target.com: February Beauty Box ONLY $10 Shipped ($38 Value)
text:
Now is the time to score a February Beauty box! Head over to Target.com where you can snatch up the new February Beauty Box ! This beauty box is available for just $10 shipped ($38 value). AND if you’re a Target REDCardholder , you will get an extra 5% off which drops the price down to just $9.50 shipped. Note that there is a limit of one beauty box per person.
This 8-Piece Beauty Box includes Masque Bar Hydrating Peel Off Mask, Raw Sugar Raw Coconut and Mango Body Wash, Soap and Glory Face Soap and Clarity Face Wash, Gliss Ultimate Repair Shampoo, Gliss Ultimate Repair Conditioner, Sun Bum Sunless Self-Tanning Towelette, W3LL PEOPLE Expressionist Pro Mascara and a L’Oréal Paris Pure-Clay Mask.
